通过给`checkedChildren`和`unCheckedChildren`.en-us: By passing component-type parameters to the `checkedChildren` and `unCheckedChildren` properties, you can customize the switch labels.

通过`size`设置开关的尺寸。.en-us: Set the size of the switch using the `size` parameter.

可设置是否禁用开关。.en-us: You can configure whether the switch is disabled.

可设置开关状态为只读。.en-us: You can configure the switch to be in a read-only state.

可设置开关状态为加载中。.en-us: You can configure the switch to display a loading state.

通过`checked`实现对开关状态切换的监听。.en-us: Use the `checked` property to listen for changes in the switch state.
